[![](https://i2.wp.com/photos22.flickr.com/32884621_c0ef46b8c3.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/velvetart/32884621/ "photo sharing") [Prayer on Settler Bus](http://www.flickr.com/photos/velvetart/32884621/), originally uploaded by [velvetart](http://www.flickr.com/people/velvetart/).
One of the things I love about Flickr is the amazing images you can stumble across by accident. One chap commented on the anti-Banksy graffiti below, and I had a quick nosey at his pictures. What a find. Heâ€™s documenting the withdrawal of Israeli settlers from the Gaza strip, with some powerful images already up-loaded. You can fine the whole lot [here](http://www.flickr.com/photos/velvetart/sets/658376/).
